80569772-1a5d-41dc-9fd3-380e6c70b402.description: The Fundamentals of Engineering (FE) exam is generally your first step in the process to becoming a professional licensed engineer (P.E.). It is designed for recent graduates and students who are close to finishing an undergraduate engineering degree from an EAC/ABET-accredited program. The FE exam is a computer-based exam administered year-round at NCEES-approved Pearson VUE test centers.
80569772-1a5d-41dc-9fd3-380e6c70b402.name: FE Exam

issuer.summary: issued by National Council of Examiners for Engineering and Surveying

entity.name: National Council of Examiners for Engineering and Surveying

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully passed the Fundamentals of Engineering (FE) exam.

75c896b8-c96b-4ed7-b93e-9e4636f151b5.description: The Fundamentals of Surveying (FS) exam is generally your first step in the process to becoming a professional licensed surveyor (P.S.). It is designed for recent graduates and students who are close to finishing an undergraduate surveying degree from an ABET accredited program. The FS exam is a computer-based exam administered year-round in testing windows at NCEES-approved Pearson VUE test centers.
75c896b8-c96b-4ed7-b93e-9e4636f151b5.name: FS Exam

issuer.summary: issued by National Council of Examiners for Engineering and Surveying

entity.name: National Council of Examiners for Engineering and Surveying

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully passed the Fundamentals of Surveying (FS) exam.
